title: I love it when kids say natty light beer is bad.
body:
Because that stuff actually used to be considered the cream of the crop when it first came out in the 70's. But now that is cheap it magically becomes bad.  The power of branding huh?

I actually do think Natty light tastes like ass, but so does that IPA nonsense you hipsters are drinking. Thats what beer taste like then its too hoppy and bitter.  Natty is like light IPA
